Package com.dhemery.expressing

Composable methods to evaluate boolean expressions, make assertions, wait for conditions, and take action when preconditions are met.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Evaluations
    Builds fluent expressions to make assertions and evaluate boolean conditions.
    Expressive
    Builds fluent expressions to make assertions, evaluate boolean expressions, wait for conditions, and take action when preconditions are met.
    FeatureExpressions
    Syntactic sugar for boolean features.
    FeatureSampler<S,F>
    A sampler that samples a feature of a subject.
    ForwardingExpressive
    An Expressive that forwards to another Expressive to create default tickers and prepare conditions for polling.
    PublishingCondition
    Wraps a condition to publish the result of each evaluation.
    QuietlyTrue
    Quietly evaluates whether a boolean value is true.
    SamplerCondition<V>
    A condition that is satisfied when a sampled variable satisfies some criteria.

Package com.dhemery.expressing Description

Composable methods to evaluate boolean expressions, make assertions, wait for conditions, and take action when preconditions are met.
